name: Nintendo DS Sound Data File
summary: Learn about .SDAT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: SDAT files can be found within .NDS ROM files. Once the ROM file has been extracted, users can unpack the SDAT file to access the SSEQ files by running the following Sdattool command: sdattool -x sound_data.sdat.
SDAT files commonly use the filename Sound_Data.sdat.
NOTE: The Sdattool program is no longer available for download.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
